colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES GSANG CHEN THEG MCHOG PHUN TSOGS CHOS GLING GI SPRUL SKU RIG 'DZIN NAM MKHA' RDO RJE'I ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS SMON TSIG DANG BCAS PA @003B DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB CES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS SHING LUNG RTOGS KYI YON TAN DANG LDAN PA, GRVA TSANG 'DI'I SLOB DPON BDE GSHEGS BSRUNG GIS SNGA MO NAS BSKUL ZHING, SLANG MAR YANG GTZUG LAG BLTA BA'I RNAM DPYOD CAN DBU MDZAD RTA MGRIN SKYABS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, GSUNG RAB SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR GSANG SNGAGS GSAR RNYING GI CHOS TSUL DU MA LA BLO GROS CUNG ZAD RGYAS PA, RIG PA 'DZIN PA, NGAG DBANG 'JIGS MED RDO RJE'AM MING GZHAN GDOD NAS RANG GROL DU 'BOD PAS BGYIS PA'O, ,SARBA K'A LE SHRI YO BHA WANTU, ,)
